name: Team Greenovators
description: Secured 3rd place at HDSE Leadership Intensive 2025 (June 2-6) at Agastya International Foundation, Kuppam. Presented SnapAgri - an AI-powered pest detection system featuring Kannada voice input, image-based detection, offline SMS guidance in regional languages, and free crop insurance for small farmers. Organized by Lehigh University, IUCEE, and Agastya Foundation. Team: Shivaanii G H (ECE, 2nd year) and Jeevan Kamsagar (ECE, 1st year).

name: Web Dev Hackathon Champions
description: 1st Place at the 24-Hour Web Dev Hackathon (MIT Mysore, May 17, 2025). Harsh Patel, Pabitra, and Pragyanshu won â‚¹25,000 for their creativity, technical skills, and problem-solving. A proud moment for NIE IUCEE Student Chapter!

name: Bidirectional Audio to ISL Translator
description: Won 3rd Prize at IEEE Ideathon 2025 (Malnad College, Hassan) for a real-time tool that translates audio/text to Indian Sign Language and ISL gestures to text/audio, with support for multiple Indian languages. Promotes inclusive communication for the hearing-impaired across India.
